SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url, u.status_message, u.profile_theme, u.avatar_decoration, u.popover_decoration, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f1 JOIN users uf1 ON uf1.id = f1.follower_id WHERE f1.following_id = u.id AND uf1.is_deleted = 0) AS follower_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f2 JOIN users uf2 ON uf2.id = f2.following_id WHERE f2.follower_id = u.id AND uf2.is_deleted = 0) AS following_count, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM follows f3 WHERE f3.follower_id = #{viewerId} AND f3.following_id = u.id ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_following FROM users u WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.is_deleted = 0

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url, u.status_message, u.profile_theme, u.avatar_decoration, u.popover_decoration, u.role, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f1 JOIN users uf1 ON uf1.id = f1.follower_id WHERE f1.following_id = u.id AND uf1.is_deleted = 0) AS follower_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f2 JOIN users uf2 ON uf2.id = f2.following_id WHERE f2.follower_id = u.id AND uf2.is_deleted = 0) AS following_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quizzes q WHERE q.user_id = u.id AND q.is_public = 1) AS quiz_count, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM follows f3 WHERE f3.follower_id = #{viewerId} AND f3.following_id = u.id ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_followed_by_me FROM users u WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.is_deleted = 0
